overview:
Debra Domeyer is Chief Executive Officer of Oversee.net. She recently served as Co-President and Chief Technology Officer of the company.

Debra has over twenty five years of leadership experience in technology management positions. Prior to joining Oversee in 2008, she was the Chief Technology Officer at Internet Brands, an online media company. Debra also served as Vice President and Chief Information Officer at Pacific Gas & Electric Energy Services, and was Vice President of Information Systems for the Times Mirror Company.

She also served in the White House during the Reagan Administration, supervising the development of distributed applications and secure communications for the President’s trips worldwide.

In 2001, Debra was named one of the top 25 CTOs by InfoWorld Magazine and was listed in the ComputerWorld Premier 100 IT leaders. She has spoken at numerous technology conferences.

Debra has a B.A. from Loras College and a Master’s degree from George Washington University.
